summary: CONSUMER COMPLAINED ABOUT HAVING PROBLEMS WITH THE AIR BAG DEPLOYMENT. ALSO, WHILE DRIVING VEHICLE WAS INVOLVED IN A COLLISION, AND AIR BAGS DID NOT DEPLOY .PASSENGER WAS DRIVING AT 50 MPH WHEN PASSING OVER A BRIDGE ON A RAINY DAY, AND WATER FROM THE RIVER WAS SPLASHED ON THE FRONT WINDSHIELD WHICH CAUSED THE DRIVER TO LOOSE CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE. MANUFACTURE WAS NOT CONTACTED AT THE TIME OF THIS PHONE CALL. *AK
